Jay Electronica to President Obama: “You should be ashamed dog”

posted by Andres Tardio on December 8, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of

Jay Electronica doesn’t speak up very often, but when he does, he makes it count. His latest tweets address race, crime, and the state of affairs in America. “We live in a criminal nation, founded by rapists, mass murderers and robbers. So don’t tell me about ‘black on black’ crime,” he says. “These motherfuckers are poisoning the food air land and water and causes wars all over the earth.” Jay then went on to address President Obama directly. Read the tweets above.

Jay is currently on the road with Common for the Nobody’s Smiling tour.
